text: I’m stumped at what’s going on. I have a module with a boolean field that shows or hides content in . The module preview works as expected, and previewing the landing page with the Preview button shows the proper behavior. However, when I make a change with the form fields on the left, the Preview on the right doesn’t always update. Sometimes it does and sometimes it doesn’t. Is there a click event that I could listen for to trigger a reload of the Preview panel on the right?
How do you hide the opacity option for the color picker from the user?
But I don't want the opacity option to even show on their side.

If you're using local development you should be able to use `visibility` - something like this in boilerplate: <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/master/src/modules/pricing-card.module/fields.json#L87>
